name: Hidden Hell
description:
Hidden Hell is a project that has been done in 2 months by 5 students in their first year of Game design. The project's theme was "You are the villain". 

You play as Bobby Fischer who is interned in the Ulysses Grant psychiatric hospital,
he follows his usual routine between appointments and medicination.
But a mysterious character creates chaos through the hospital, in addition nurses and doctors seem to hide things, Bobby is going to investigate... 
Will you be able to elucidate the mystery hanging over the place ?

The game is in french and was made in E-artsup Nantes school.
